data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shih, Hsi-Te, Ng, Peter K. L., Fang, Shou-Hua, Chan, Benny K. K., Wong, Kingsley J. H. (2010): Diversity and distribution of fiddler crabs (Brachyura: Ocypodidae: Uca) from China, with new records from Hainan Island in the South China Sea. Zootaxa 2640: 1-19, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198567
